docs.snippet: A man who was recorded confessing to the killings of two Chinese graduate students near the University of Southern California was convicted Monday of first-degree murder....
docs.lead_paragraph: A man who was recorded confessing to the killings of two Chinese graduate students near the University of Southern California was convicted Monday of first-degree murder.

headline.main: Man Guilty of Murder in Attack on Chinese Students

docs.snippet: Sports often play a unifying role for communities. That's harder to achieve in Washington, where many of the residents hail from elsewhere....

byline.original: By ALBERT R. HUNT | BLOOMBERG VIEW

docs.snippet: As Major League Soccer begins its postseason, it is also readying for labor talks in which a key topic will be player salaries, which lag far behind those in the major professional sports leagues....
docs.lead_paragraph: As Major League Soccer begins its postseason, it is also readying for labor talks in which a key topic will be player salaries, which lag far behind those in the major professional sports leagues.
docs.abstract: Salaries of Major League Soccer players lag far behind others in major professional sports leagues, key topic of discussion as league's postseason begins; while league's revenue and ratings still lag far behind billion-dollar behemoths like the NFL and Major League Basball, MLS has minted its own crop of multi-millionaire players and is set for an infusion of television money starting in 2015.

headline.main: Many in M.L.S. Playing Largely for Love of the Game
headline.print_headline: Many in M.L.S. Playing Largely for Love of the Game

docs.snippet: Night is the most difficult time at the rural teachers college, where families have stayed on thin, bare mattresses in classrooms since 43 students went missing a month ago. The day's distractions of meals, meetings and marches end, and the parent...
docs.lead_paragraph: Night is the most difficult time at the rural teachers college, where families have stayed on thin, bare mattresses in classrooms since 43 students went missing a month ago. The day's distractions of meals, meetings and marches end, and the parents are left with their thoughts, questions and a simmering rage.

headline.main: Families of Missing Mexican Students Still Waiting
headline.print_headline: Families of Missing Mexican Students Still Waiting
